about.whatis.desc: plug³ er et "Javascript" som gir deg; Autowoot, Autojoin, egendefinerte Chat Farger, Borte-Fra-Tastaturet (Away From Keyboard) Auto-Respons, spesielle varsler, Aktivere og deaktivere Stream, AFK timer i bruker-listen, egendefinerte instillinger og mye mer!
about.authors.desc.B: Ulike andre har også bidratt til dette prosjektet.
alpha.bugs: HUSK: ALPHA-VERSJONER KAN OG VIL INNEHOLDE FEIL
alpha.desc: Når vi jobber med plug³, vil vi legge ut en alpha versjon noenganger.
alpha.desc2: Vi er glad når folk vil bruke denne versjonen og rapportere feil/problemer til oss, så vi kan fikse det før den endelige versjonen kommer ut.
alpha.quickSetup: Fort oppsett over hvordan du installerer plug³ Alpha
alpha.title: plug³ Alpha
alpha.usage: Klikk og dra en av knappene til dine bokmerker (min er bare minst), og når du bruker plug.dj, trykk på bokmerket!
ambassadors.desc: Våre plug³ Ambassadører hjelper med problemer og promoteringer. Hvis du ønsker å delta i programmet, vennligst fyll ut skjemaet nedenfor
ambassadors.name: Navn
donate.info.1: Hvis du har donert $10 eller mer, kan du få et donasjons-ikon ved siden navnet på plug.dj for alle plug³ brukere.
donate.info.2: For å få ikon, vennligst send en e-post til
donate.info.3: with the transaction id and your userID.
donate.info.4: For å få din bruker-ID, bruk /whoami på plug mens du kjører plug³
commands.desc: Du kan bruke kommandoer ved å skrive /command i chat. 'Command' kan du bytte med kommandoen. Nedenfor er en omfattende liste over alle kommandoer du kan bruke.
commands.title: Kommandoer
commands.automute: Registrer spillende sang for å automatisk bli dempet hver gang den spilles
commands.nextsong: Vis neste sang i spillelisten og om den er i Dj-historielisten
commands.alertson: Spill av lyd når definerte ord er skrevet i chat
commands.alertsoff: Slutt å spill lyd når definerte ord er skrevet i chat
commands.grab: Legg til spillende sang til din valgte spilleliste
commands.getpos: Gir deg din gjeldende posisjon i Dj-køen
commands.link: Lim inn kobling til plug³ nettside i chat
commands.lockskip: Locks DJ booth, skip and unlocks afterwards
commands.add: Adds targeted user to dj booth/waitlist
commands.remove: Removes targeted user from dj booth/waitlist
commands.whoisall: Gives userid and username of all users in the room
commands.banall: Bans all users in the room
features.title: plug³ Features
features.description: There are so many great features that plug³ has to offer, the main ones being Auto wooting songs and Auto joining the waitist. Take a look below to see just what features plug³ really has.
features.woot: Auto Woot: Automatically WOOT! each song as it is played
features.join: Auto Join: Automatically rejoin the DJ Waitlist once you've been moved back to the crowd.
features.easyui: Easy UI: Allows you to easily configure your plug³ experience
features.easyui.info: Enable or disable each part at the click of a button.
features.chatlogs: Custom chat logged notifications that display:
features.chatlogs.history: Song is in History (room staff only)
features.chatlogs.songlong: Song is longer than x minutes (room staff only)
features.chatcmd: A variety of chat commands that enable you to:
features.chatcmd.booth: Join/Leave the waitlist or DJ Booth with /join or /leave
features.chatcmd.mute: Mute and unmute songs with /mute or /unmute
features.chatcmd.waitlist: Get your current waitlist postion with /getpos
features.moderate.history: History Alerts: Display in chat when a song is in histroy
features.moderate.userdata: User Data Logging: Record user join time, vote counts / ratio, rank, and much more
features.mod.cmd: Moderation in chat command form (some examples, to view more please view our commands list
features.mod.cmd.baninfo.1: If you would like to specify a reason, use
features.mod.cmd.baninfo.2: if you would like to specify both a reason and time, use
global.bookmark.desc: Just copy the code below and create a new bookmark:
global.slogan: Adding a New Dimension to plug
global.quickSetup: Quick setup on how to install plug³
global.quickSetDesc: plug³ can be used in various ways. Please choose only one of the following methods:
global.quickSetP1.A: It is made for easy bookmark usage. All you have to do is click and drag one of the buttons below called 'plug³' or 'plug³ min' (Both are the same, 'plug³' min is just minified.) and move it to your bookmarks bar. Once you have done that, just head on over to a room on
global.quickSetP1.B: and run that bookmark. All set!
global.quickSetP2: It can also be used with one of our extensions. We have one for Opera, Firefox, & Chrome. Just click to install and then head on over to a room on
global.quickSetP3: We also have a userscript that can be installed that works just the same as the extension. Just click to install and then head on over to a room on
global.compat.info: plug³ can be used on any modern browser.
layout.usage: Either install the userscript by clicking it below or install a browser extension, or click and drag one of the buttons to your bookmarks, and whilst using plug.dj, run the bookmark!
install.slogan: A quick guide on how to install plug³
translate.desc: This is the current list of people helping translate plug³, if you'd like to be added to the list please contact Thedark1337 via
translate.name: Navn
